nodes.text: The Vallaido Clan was a group of pirates that operated during the time of Galactic Civil War.

The flagship of the Vallaido fleet was the Valla's Glorious Gesture. The Vallaido children began their pirate careers by operating the Gesture's turbolasers. The Human Siro Simito was a member of the clan, but after he realized that he was not suited to the life of a pirate, he left and became a starship racer. At some point afterward, the Vallaido fleet was devastated by the combined forces of the Galactic Empire and the Seville pirate clan.
